featured_projects.name: DIY Graphics Card
featured_projects.description: A completely DIY graphics card based on an extremely optimized version of the popular Ben Eater design. The ATMega32 can be programmed to do all kinds of geometric calculations and rendering, while the PALs enable for different resolutions based on the crystal used.

featured_projects.name: DIY USB MIDI Converter
featured_projects.description: A DIY MIDI Converter based on the PIC16F1459 microcontroller, handles SysEx like a champ and does rudimentary MIDI filtering for incoming notes.
